data.message: Sorry to be off topic but I have someone I would like to turn in they said they were with Facebook telling me I won an extremely amount of cash in order to receive it I had to pay out 300 some dollars for FedEx to deliver my winnings

replies.message: Hey Kevin, this sounds like a hoax. We recommend that you do not provide any personal or financial information to the sender and report the spam to us by using these tips: http://bit.ly/2aHyEKd. Thanks for helping us keep Facebook a safe place! -Jordan

Kevin if someone starts a go fun me account here in Facebook for someone and the person that the funds were to go to never received any fund how do they collect it and find out who donated it to thank them
He goes under the name of Mr.Gillermo Hernedez Facebook head office telling me I had won 600000 $ scam?

If they ask for money to get money you've supposedly won - look out!! I don't trust anyone asking for money up front. If you think something fraudulent is happening, please contact your State Attorney General.
It's a scam and usually Nigerian.  You should never have to pay money for winning money.  They got me back in 1992.
No way, they say that to everyone. I hope you didn't believe them.
I think  some of them from India too.

They got me too, and exactly what the cops said, only it was for mystery shoppers which I had done in Utah, so when I put the money in my account, I was overdrawn as the check was counterfeit, what made me mad I had the account for 17 years, and the bank didn't care. Be careful!!!
It is a scam. Give no info.
Lisa Marie Martini-Coyle what did you expect the bank to do? This scams as old as dirt and people still fall for it.
So it would maybe help on the oceans to provide a connection without high high prices to have Internet? Cuz that would be amazing!

I have to worry about the few remaining primitive tribes we have left. Many of these tribes have never seen or even heard of a computer believe it or not. And they are happy that way. We have so much hatred and violence in our "civilized" society, I hate to see this "collectivity" destroy their simple but happy lives.

Josh Droullard, I was actually doing it in Utah, and was under the impression that it was the same company. It happened about seven years ago, but in Utah I'd been doing it legitimately for 2 years. You don't need to be rude! I certainly wasn't rude to anyone. Just putting it out there!
It's a scam!
Do not respond!!!! Scam for sure if they want $ up front!!!
delete them as fast  as you can   and  block therm
Sorry to change subject, but class action lawsuits shouldn't be legal either. I know a guy that got involved in a 200,000,000 $ one, and got a check for $1.89.
Had same  thing  happen  last  year  it a scam

DON'T SEND ANY MONEY,  ITS A TRICK , 
IF YOU WON , THEY SHOULD SEND YOU A CHECK , NOT, YOU SEND THEM ANYTHING, 
SO DON'T  
THESE PEOPLE ARE THEFTS
Mark I got $0.20 more on the class action I was in
Scam. It's being done on cell phones, land lines, email. DONT. SCAM!  Never give out any personal information
Sounds fishy
This sounds like the idiots out of Nigeria, that have been running the same scam for years.  Just tell them to take it out of your money, and send the rest to you!
Oh brother. Sir. Please do not buy any bridges anywhere
